mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, content, images, video, tags, visible_type, exclude_users, status, audit_status, audit_reason, like_count, comment_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO square_post ( user_id, title, content, images, video, tags, visible_type, exclude_users, status, audit_status, audit_reason, like_count, comment_count, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{images}, #{video}, #{tags}, #{visibleType}, #{excludeUsers}, #{status}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditReason}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE square_post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, images = #{images}, video = #{video}, tags = #{tags}, visible_type = #{visibleType}, exclude_users = #{excludeUsers}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND status != 0
UPDATE square_post SET like_count = GREATEST(like_count + #{likeDelta}, 0), comment_count = GREATEST(comment_count + #{commentDelta}, 0), update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM square_post WHERE status = 1 AND audit_status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
